<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=["标   签::::1",
" NP ::np::4::a",
"父子::父子::4::a",
"兄弟::兄弟::4::a",
"年上::年上::4::a",
"校园::校园::4::a",
" B E ::BE::4::a",
"出轨::出轨::4::a",
"生子::生子::4::a",
"年下::年下::4::a",
"双性::双性::4::a",
"ABO::ABO::4::a",
"强强::强强::4::a",
"哥哥::哥哥::4::a",
"反攻::反攻::4::a",
"强制::强制::4::a",
"掰弯::掰弯::4::a",
"高 h::高h::4::a",
"主攻::主攻::4::a",
"互攻::互攻::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
item_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result); url = Get('urls'); //java.log(JSON.stringify(url)); path = "/content?item_id="+item_id; u = url =>java.ajax(url+path); function random(m, n){ let num = Math.round((Math.random()*(n-m))+m); return num } let content, result, ret = 0; do{ api = (Get('ci0') == 0 || ret > 0) ? random(1, 7) : Get('ci0'); java.log(((Get('ci0') == 0 || ret > 0) ? ruleContent.content:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
var sz = Number(source.getVariable());
if(sz==null || sz==""){
   sz = -2
   source.setVariable(sz);
}

item_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result);

path = "/content?item_id="+item_id;
u = url =>{
  java.log(url+path)
  return java.ajax(url+path)
};

var errorNum = 0

// 错误或者没有
var errorNextFn = (value) => {
java.log("接口"+ (value+1) +"错误");
var nextValue = value + 1
nextValue = nextValue>urlArray.length-1?0:nextValue
errorNum++
// 接口继续
if(errorNum<urlArray.length){
   return getHtml(nextValue)
  }else{
  // 源计划的正文
  return isYJHhtml(item_id)
 }
}

var getHtml = (value)=>{
 if(sz >= 0){
   java.log(`设置了${urlArray[Number(value)].dec}:${urlArray[Number(value)].url}`)
   htmlData = u(urlArray[value].url)
   content = java.getString(urlArray[value].html,htmlData);
    if(urlArray[value].fn!=null){
     content=urlArray[value].fn(content)
    }
   return content
 }else if(sz  == -1 ){
  java.log('设置了源计划正文解密')
  return isYJHhtml(item_id)
 }else{
  java.log('设置了随机接口')
   try{
      htmlData = u(urlArray[value].url)
      content = java.getString(urlArray[value].html,htmlData);
      if(urlArray[value].fn){
       content=urlArray[value].fn(content)
      }
      if(content=="" || content=="undefined"){
       return errorNextFn(value)
     }
     return content
    }catch(err1){
     return errorNextFn(value)
    }
 }
}
if(sz==-2){
 result = getHtml(parseInt(Math.random()*urlArray.length))
}else{
 result = getHtml(sz)
}
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleSearch.name: .p1@text||.s2@text

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

2022-08-15
@tjjj812
可搜，有分类，有预览图，能下载
在线看网站是按照字数分页的，所以没有目录，最佳食用方式是下下来看。
把【类型】改为【文本】就可以在线看了。
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
网页版有bug
如果编辑了之后要到手机端把【类型】改为【文件】，
把详情页下载url规则改为
【@js:java.get("bookDownURL")】
原看帮网，搞了一遍通过详情预处理来进行解析，并通过get方法获取文件地址的方式获取文件，站点也有ZIP可下，有需要的可以改成下载ZIP
需要设置本地文件存储位置才能正确下载。
用手机写js写的脑仁疼。。。""""

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='（下面 [换源列表] 若有多个项时，点详情页右上角 -> [设置书籍变量]，输入序号，[确定] 后再点 [刷新]，可更改对应的源，默认为0）【换源列表】：\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n————————————\n'+intro
</js>
##更新 .*

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var book = {
	name: o('h1'),
	author: o('.bq span:eq(1)'),
	kind: o('.bq span:eq(2)').replace(/.*：|中|已/g, ''),
	latest: o('.lastchapter a') + ' • ' + o('.bq span:eq(0)').match(/(\d+-\d+-\d+)/)[1],
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.bq span:eq(0)').match(/(\d+-\d+-\d+)/)[1] + '\n' + o('.jj').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: J.select('.pic img').attr('src'),
	url: baseUrl.replace(/book/,'read'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".manga-list-2 li"),
  $ = key => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".manga-list-2-title a"),
    author: $(".book-list-info-bottom-item").replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/").replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: $(".manga-list-2-tip a").replace(/已更新\s/, ""),
    intro: "",
    cover: String(list[i].select("img").attr("data-original")).replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".book-list li"),
  $ = key => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨久久漫画💞：搜索失效，请修复")
  : ""
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".book-list-info-title"),
    author: $(".book-list-info-bottom-item")
      .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/").replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/")
      .replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: $(".book-list-info-bottom-right-font").replace(/[中已]/,""),
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro:$(".book-list-info-desc"),
    cover: String(list[i].select(".book-list-cover-img").attr("data-original"))
      .replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
list == 0
  ? java.log("🎨久久漫画💞：目录失效，请修复")
  : ""
date = String(java.getElements(".detail-list-title-3").text()).replace(/更新/g, "")
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `[${list.length}]·${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕`
      : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/(正文|VIP章节|全部章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*|最新章节.*（提示.*）\s/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.info3 p:eq(1)').replace(/.*：/,'') + '\n' + o('.info2 p').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: J.select('.info1 img').attr('src'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: String(og('novel:latest_chapter_name')).replace(/\/.*53zw.net/, '') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>
